price: (Kuasa Allah) yang demikian itu adalah karena sesungguhnya Allah, Dia-lah (Tuhan) Yang Hak dan sesungguhnya apa saja yang mereka seru selain Allah, itulah yang batil dan sesungguhnya Allah, Dia-lah Yang Maha Tinggi lagi Maha Besar.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَأَنَّ مَا يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ هُوَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha huwa al-ḥaqu wa-anna mā yadʿūna min dūnihi huwa al-bāṭilu wa-anna al-laha huwa al-ʿaliyu al-kabīru
